评论概述: Good fit, not too tight or loose. Lots of features.
评论详情: I don’t like pants that are butt huggers. These pants are completely going to impress you. The material is not that flammable nylon. Many features, zipper fly, belt loop’s, draw-string, button pockets in back zippers on the lowers. Great price too. Buy it!

I ordered these not expecting much and with Fer of them not fitting right due to conversion sizes. My concerns were unfounded though. So far these pants have proven to be of sturdy quality. I wear them 3 days out of the week. No issues with craftsmanship so far and they are comfortable. It's nice not having a belt digging into my stomach anymore or not holding up my pants properly. As for the size I didn't know what to order but I contacted seller and with a little info like weight, normal American pant size, they gave me a recommendation and when the pants arrived they fit perfect, not to small and not falling off my butt. I would buy another pair.

These are very poor in quality. These came torn the moment I bent over to pick something up - that has never happened to me before. Also, the color grey is actually a shade of green. Overall - really poor experience with these.

I got these because I had the same in shorts and liked them. These came way too long, had a tailor shorten by 5”(!).  They are comfy because they are wide through the hips and legs. I would never wear then in public, they’re very droopy-draws and, well, not very stylish.

My husband hates wearing belts, but has no hips and his pants are always falling down (plumbers Crack 😆) so I suggested elastic waist. These are perfect, and no more belts or pants falling down. They are thin, so if ypu work outdoors and wear in fall or winter, I'd Def size up so you can wear something underneath. They wash and dry easily,  no fading or wear and tear. This is the second pair I've bought. My husband is about 5'6 and 165lbs. Usually gets a 31 or 32 waist, so I got a size Large and they fit great, even after washing and drying.
The felt big on me, but I used the recommended size.
